subject: Football
Sentences (Criminal)
lead_paragraph: Michael Bennett, a former N.F.L. first-round draft pick, was sentenced in federal court in Fort Lauderdale, Fla., to 15 months in prison for wire fraud.
snippet: Michael Bennett, a former N.F.L. first-round draft pick, was sentenced in federal court in Fort Lauderdale, Fla., to 15 months in prison for wire fraud.
